misc: Loves basketball even more than Marcus, making some fans wonder if he's a real golfer
biography: Pasi, affectionately known as "Susi-Pasi," is a formidable presence on the golf course, bringing a unique blend of skill and intensity to every tournament. Representing Vuosaari Golf Helsinki, Pasi's journey in the Hector Trophée is marked by memorable performances and a relentless pursuit of excellence. He has participated in the event three times, showcasing his talents on multiple occasions.

Off the course, Pasi's passion extends beyond golf, with a notable enthusiasm for basketball. Some fans even wonder if he's a real golfer, as his love for hoops rivals even that of Marcus. However, when it comes to the Hector Trophée, Pasi is all business, bringing a competitive edge and strategic acumen to the greens. With one Hector Trophée victory under his belt, Pasi is a force to be reckoned with in pair play.

As he prepares for his fourth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Pasi remains a player to watch. His dedication to the sport, combined with his unique personality, makes him a compelling figure in the world of golf. Whether sinking a crucial putt or discussing the latest basketball scores, Pasi brings a distinctive flair to the Hector Trophée.
